website_summaries.verdict: This simple smart security pyramid offers all the basic features at an affordable price. Guardzilla records sharp video and audio, offers live monitoring, and most users are pleased with the performance.
pros: Picture and sound quality are excellent, and this is the only security system able to record video locally to an SD memory card
cons: The unusual shape might draw attention to itself in a robbery
Some users complain the siren isn't loud enough, and sometimes triggered false alarms due to overly sensitive motion detector

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: Seems like they only are interested in getting you buy into their monthly cloud service. They require you to turn on push notifications in order for the device to work, and then they use those push notifications to send ads to your phone. SUPER IRRITATING!!! About half the time when you open the app you have to click through an ad to get to the controls for your device. The app is poorly designed in general, and functionality is glitchy. I've had several occasions where I disarm the device, and then proceed to get multiple alerts when I walk around in the room. I strongly regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mighty Handy

customer_reviews.title: Great for checking on the kids.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to check in on my kids. It was really easy to set up. Works great and they don't know it is a nanny cam. The only negative is that a small light changes color from green to blue when I use the web app to view the footage - which at some point may cause the kids to figure out I am watching them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Greta price and performance
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with Guardzilla. Very easy setup and I monitor via cell phone and IPad even When Abroad with no problems. Given the low price and no additional fees unless one opts for Pro-monitoring I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pop33897

customer_reviews.title: Guardzilla "has closed its doors"
customer_reviews.text: bought a new guardzilla in May and it stopped working in June. Because; "We deeply regret that these troubling times have caused us to close our doors. We are sorry for any inconvenience this has caused, as we will be unable to continue support for the Guardzilla product line." Now what do I do with all the guardzillas , I own 4 of them :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent connection & use of app
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Jan 2017. Loved it but even with app updates, it's an inconsistent product. It has auto activate when you leave the area, and deactivate when you return, which is GREAT when it works, but I'd say 25% of the time it does not, and that is irritating. Also the app on my iphone does get updated by the company, but it does not show the images live very often anymore - I find it to rarely work at this point.
customer_reviews.author: JDinNH

customer_reviews.title: Good Product - Cusomer Service Problematic
customer_reviews.text: Good product but custom service by phone could not be heard and the wait time was substantial. I bought 2 of these and can't get the second one to work.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Rudorfer

customer_reviews.title: Bad Connectivity
customer_reviews.text: good quality on materials, video and audio. Problem is connectivity. It goes off the network every other day and the only way to get it back into the WIFI and be able to checkout on the app is manually unplug from power and let it boot back up. Impossible to do when out of town, and frankly, having to do it from time to time is just not doable
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Vera

customer_reviews.title: No tech support.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately guardzilla no longer offers tech-support. I have been unable to get hold of them for weeks now and if you do any research at all you will see that you really cannot get hold of them. They cannot even email me my old password any longer. Not sure what has happened as it used to be a good system.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Varner

customer_reviews.title: The Godzilla is great I like all the features about it and the ...
customer_reviews.text: The Godzilla is great I like all the features about it and the fact that I can monitor it without a monthly fee is great thank you
customer_reviews.author: tom westbrook

customer_reviews.title: Great way to monitor your home
customer_reviews.text: Have used guardzilla for years. Deos it have issues of sending alerts when you have not activated the alarm yes, deos it crash sometimes yes..... however it still is a great value and the issues don’t outweigh that. Great to watch your pets and just have that extra security with the high dollars
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Budget cameras that is exactly that
customer_reviews.text: This camera is crap. Video quality is expected to be shotty but the features doesn't stay set. I set the siren to 5 secs and it still go on for 30 secs. It doesn't detect motion all the time. I literally was dancing in the room where the cam is set and it didn't sound the alarm. Don't watch the review videos... I'm sure the people were paid to say the nice things they say about these.
customer_reviews.author: JayOSmitty

customer_reviews.title: To see or not to be seen?
customer_reviews.text: I love them but they stop working. The two I bought has stop working. Our son look at them himself and for both to stop at this time was beyond him as well. So i have a warrant and send them back for you fix or two that work in my house?
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Kinkead

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Can be tricky to set up but once it is Ready to go it is very reliable. If it detects motion it starts recording for 30 seconds. And also alert you to the motion or who has walked in the room. You can logon from your phone and watch what’s going on live feed You can also review the video under the history. You can also hear the person in the room. But to be able to hear or speak back you do have to pay a monthly fee about $5. Very good camera love the text alerts so you can log onto camera. Great value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: I love, love
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this product. Initially I only had one. It came in handy when my door was actually left unlocked. I can monitor from far away. I then put one in another room where a storm accidentally moved my door a little bit. I was able to peek in to see what was happening. I love the feature where you can log in and speak to anyone there and/or sound the alarm if needed. Perfect for any home.
customer_reviews.author: Nane

customer_reviews.title: No connection when on cellular
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to set up, no issues with that at all. Looks cool in the pictures but its much larger than I thought and its ugly in person. When I was on any wifi I was able to access the camera but it never connected when my phone was on cellular. Returning it today because I need to be able to access the camera from anywhere just like the description says but fails to do.
customer_reviews.author: SATX

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this item at first. However, after 3 weeks, the motion detection did not activate and finally it would not connect to WiFi. Item is defective. Awaiting a new replacement. Replacement came today and it was used not brand new. Camera face all scratched up, ac adapter looks like someone spilled something and the substance splashed on the AC adapter. Unacceptable! Aren't the items inspected before being sent to a customer?!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Anne

customer_reviews.title: Company Out of Business - Product no longer functional
customer_reviews.text: Company Out of Business - Product no longer functional. Product itself worked well but can no longer login as company is now shutting down.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Can't get camera it to connect to wifi
customer_reviews.text: I used to own 2 of these. I just purchased this one to replace one that stop working all of a sudden and this one will not recognize wifi and therefore will not connect. Also only the good one that works, I can only get sound via my ipad and not iphone. At one time it seemed that these cameras where great but no so anymore. I do no recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Customer in Detroit

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating company to work with
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these cameras. 2 indoors and 1 outdoors. They hardly ever work. I keep emailing (not usually answered for days) and told an update is coming soon. this has been months. I am trying to keep an elderly person safe by monitoring them but cannot see, hear, etc. They need to get there act together!! Do they think that we would Update and pay more if it does not work? Seriously,
customer_reviews.author: gail coppola

customer_reviews.title: It is my favorite, and I have tried cheaper and more expensive
customer_reviews.text: It is my favorite, and I have tried cheaper and more expensive. The app is super easy on this as are the color graphics. Once the cheapies die I will go all Guardzilla.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Item is garbage
customer_reviews.text: Item does not work....powers on n worked for 3 minutes....said it needed to update.....after update hasn't worked since. Per refund policy can not send back Since its past 30 days....don't buy This garbage Neighbor s guardzill stopped working after update!!!
customer_reviews.author: kitters

customer_reviews.title: Cheap unreliable junk
customer_reviews.text: App is awful It cannot use 5.8 GHz band and it’s impossible to remove your old router name from the app

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy, junk
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy, would not connect, i bought two of them and neither one would connect. customer service is non existant. the app is horrible. Tried to log in after registering and it wouldnt let me log in. save your money and get something else. wast of time.
customer_reviews.author: Kilowm

customer_reviews.title: Great for in house NOT so good across the street
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up, works like a charm, chat service answered all questions no matter how dumb. THE ALARM SOUND IS NOT DESIGNED FOR A LOT OF ELDERS WHO WOULD BUY...DRIVES OTHERS CRAZY BUT NOT US.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I should've checked reviews! Never again!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked, occasionally the first day. Cannot get it to work again. Seems to be offline all the time. Very disappointed. Threw the box in the recycle bin line a fool and it went out today so I am out the monies and stuck with something that does not work. Guardzilla support seems to be useless. No phone # and their chat never works. Just wait for them to email you. Should have checked reviews, usually do. My bad!!!
customer_reviews.author: ANJA

customer_reviews.title: not what I expected & Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to set up & the instructions SUCK not impressed & extremely disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Picture perfect, siren loud, voice could be clearer, works great. I would recommend to anyone.

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't get camera to work
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get this camera to work. Tried calling for assistance and no answer. May be a good product but don't know.

customer_reviews.title: no built in wifi as stated
customer_reviews.text: for space age-ish looking and not very discreet. Much larger than I thought it would be. I was looking for something similar to the arlo go with built in wifi. I was told this would be a competitor but it isn't

customer_reviews.title: Out of Business
customer_reviews.text: Guardzilla went out of business so you can’t set up an account.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Vise

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: This was my second & I got the other somewhere else. Had trouble connecting the two

customer_reviews.title: I easily spent over 5 hours trying to get it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a second Guardzilla camera. I am not technologically challenged. However, I could not get the second one connected. I easily spent over 5 hours trying to get it to work. Don't know if it shipped damaged, or if it was some other problem. Customer service is almost not there with this product. Would ship it back if I had time. Not happy with Guardzilla.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Starnes

customer_reviews.title: Nice for Pet Monitoring
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be able to look in on my pet. It has a nice quality picture and the night vision mode works well. I have another professional alarm company and have no intention of replacing them for home security.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy4Bags

customer_reviews.title: Great cam!
customer_reviews.text: What an easy and awesome camera to set up and use. Portable and everything i was looking for!

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: Worthless useless piece of crap, first one was crap and the reorder/replacement is just as bad. Works great when you’re at home and no need to really see,but when you’re away and need it for what it was purchased for it’s useless. Loses signal all the time.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Pay more for something better

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use

customer_reviews.title: Avoid buying this camera

customer_reviews.text: I love Guardzilla. Inexpensive way to keep an eye on my apartment. I recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Wish there was a way to take a snapshot of an image and storing it.
customer_reviews.text: It does everything it says it will do. Good investment.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I hoped it was
customer_reviews.text: I needed a simple camera to keep an eye on my lil puppy while I was at work. It works perfectly and the 2 way audio is nice. Love it and will probably be purchasing one more soon.

customer_reviews.title: 🤪

customer_reviews.text: Very happy - bought a second one! Pretty easy to set-up and works great most of the time. Love the auto-arm and auto-disarm features.

customer_reviews.title: What I had expected!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Guardzilla indoor camera so that I could check on my animals. Easy to set up and works well. Plan to purchase another one soon so that I can get another view.

customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately about 2 weeks in the camera stopped working. I attempted to contact the seller with no success. I loved the camera when it was working.

customer_reviews.text: It is absolutely a solid purchase for the first few months. Once there is a problem there is absolutely no customer support. Do not by this product.

customer_reviews.text: Easy peasey setup. Notifications are easy and timely. Online video review a simple press of a button. Nightime vision really good too.

customer_reviews.title: Gives us peace of mind when we leave the house ...
customer_reviews.text: Gives us peace of mind when we leave the house for extended periods of time. Our friends bought one after seeing ours.

customer_reviews.title: Returned

customer_reviews.title: Camera doesn't continue recording
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't keep filming when it sees something. It takes a snapshot basically and that's it.

customer_reviews.text: Every time you need it the camera is off line and you have to go back home and reset it up just like day one.

customer_reviews.text: So many false notifications. Disconnects from wifi often. Picture quality is good.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: Would give more stars, but did not come with a power source. I had to pilfer from something else in the mean time to set it up.
customer_reviews.author: Roxayn King

customer_reviews.title: The best place to put it is on a table level ...
customer_reviews.text: Could not get it to sync with our wifi. One we connected and then moved it to a different location, you had to delete the profile and start all over again. The camera does not point well. The best place to put it is on a table level and what is the point if everyone can see it. Couldn't get the communication to work either to do two-way talking. Returned item.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: So far this product exceeds expectations. Install is easy. The camera has a nice wide angle and is able to see more than I expected. The camera picture is also quite crisp. The speaker is clear and loud. The microphone is also clear which makes it easy to listen in to conversations happening in the home. My only concern is that the snapshot button will tell you it's saved a picture but then the picture doesn't exist anywhere. I have yet to install an SD card and start recording but I doubt there will be any issues. We plan to purchase a couple more for other areas of the home.
customer_reviews.author: Candace J.

customer_reviews.title: Working good so far but just got it
customer_reviews.text: Working good so far but just got it.Wish the volume was louder when talking thru it should be a way to adjust it .no bad lag or delay.Can't really get a close up on a face get to pixelated seems to work ok for now will update after using it for more time. Also some time buffers for so long can't get a picture while off site on site is fine but that's not what I need it for
customer_reviews.author: Indaskys

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great for pet patrol Update: drains the phone's battery immensely and the app freezes up constantly... literally like every minute, I am having to close the app and restart... definitely NOT worth $100, the original 5 stars I gave it, or the frustration!! Will definitely be looking for a better quality camera/app combo. This one has seriously disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: doreo.13

customer_reviews.title: Junk from day one.....
customer_reviews.text: Junk from day one..... Don't want to waste another second on it...

customer_reviews.title: Decent, easy setup, does the job
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, works fine. Minus one star for not having a web site to log in and watch, you must use the app. In my workplace I don't have mobile service or wifi, so I can't check the camera. Camera is SD quality, but sufficient. App is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: W. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great product does everything that they say it will
customer_reviews.text: Great product does everything that they say it will. Only thing I would like to see changed is that you ccould hear sound and talk at the same time!

customer_reviews.text: I like it but I hate that it sometimes will give false alerts. I was waking me up out of my sleep. other than that, it has a great camera. The alerts come through quickly. I wish it were a little more discreet. The red light on the front is a dead giveaway that it is a camera.
customer_reviews.author: trendy1

customer_reviews.title: it isn't as easy. First it says no camera available
customer_reviews.text: I'm still trying to figure this out, as simple as the setup is, it isn't as easy. First it says no camera available, then after 10 minutes it ,it says locating living room. Once I arm it, I go into montior,camera says buffering. I went into the guardzilla settings and touched signal strength then pressed test and it says unfortunately , guardzilla has stopped. I'm not sure if you need the memory card to activate it. But I guess I'll figure out and if it's a problem, I will not bother anymore. Don't waste your time with this camera. There's better ones that's cheaper and it's much easier set up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tried to set up camera and it gets to naming ...
customer_reviews.text: Tried to set up camera and it gets to naming the device this hangs on the "please wait..." banner. Called tech support. They said I need to have a wifi connection that is only 2.4GHz. No problem. I create one, and make sure it has no password just in case. Same exact issue. No problem. I open the other box (I had purchased two). Same exact issue. I'm done.

customer_reviews.text: It is a great idea and for the most part it does work well. My particular unit ... the voice volume is very low so when I tell fido to get off the couch.. she barely can hear it. Software locked up on me twice but usually works well.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with the Guardzilla
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with the Guardzilla. It's practical, precise and the best value available for home security without having a monthly monitoring company to pay. You can randomly look around your home, speak and hear from the device right through your phone. I plan to add more.

customer_reviews.title: Great item! Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about this product. I feel safe. I can communicate with my family in the room if need be. Works excellent. This is the wave of the future. You will be able to keep an eye out on your home while away. The volume and the listening button really work. Great picture. I can't say enough good things about it. I will buy one for every room.

customer_reviews.title: ... recordings on their online servers The picture quality is good most of the time but sound coming from the ...

customer_reviews.title: Cameras are awesome. They time out sometimes and if have to ...

customer_reviews.title: The good: video and audio quality is good
customer_reviews.text: The good: video and audio quality is good. The 2-way speaker works. The app works well (when you're able to connect to the camera) when you're connected to the same Wifi as the camera. The bad: Very buggy, problems connecting to the camera starting day 2. Cannot connect to the camera when you're not on the same wifi connection! Their troubleshooting and help section leaves a lot to be desired, they use youtube videos to guide you through the app. I'll be returning my purchase.

customer_reviews.text: Junk. Using Android version. Siren will not turn on no matter what you do. There should also be a panic button to turn it on manually. Locks up often and keeps alerting me even when disarmed. Total garbage and all 3 cameras are going right back to Amazon. Don't waste your money people!

customer_reviews.text: It was easy to set up. Only issue is sometimes away it takes long time to buffer so I can get a picture.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera with easy set-up
customer_reviews.text: Guardzilla app is easy to learn and camera was very easy to set up. Guardzilla support webpage has many easy-to-follow videos for various set-up and operation procedures. Highly recommend for an affordable indoor security camera.
customer_reviews.author: Fred P

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I talk to my dogs during the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I talk to my dogs during the day via this camera.. Totally worth the money.. Wish they could see me when I am fussing about them getting into my shoes though..
customer_reviews.author: Angi

customer_reviews.title: It worked just fine as long as I was home
customer_reviews.text: It worked just fine as long as I was home. When I left, no such luck. I watched the troubleshooting videos a dozen times. I called customer support, but nobody ever picked up the line. Returning it today.
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: We love our Guardzilla
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a reasonably priced camera to add security to your home, Guardzilla is exactly what you're looking for! The set up is simple and the application is easy to use; the picture quality is good and alarm options and microphones are great features. This unobtrusive camera makes us feel much more secure about what is happening at home when we are not there. We are so glad we purchased our Guardzilla!
customer_reviews.author: Optimistic Woman

customer_reviews.title: Simple security
customer_reviews.text: Good product that was easy to set up. When my phone is on a wifi connection, it works great. My home internet connection is a wifi hotspot and the system does not work with the phone on cellular data. I don't think both the phone and camera can be on cellular data connections.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Busselle

customer_reviews.title: The app is the best, and the connection to my wi-fi is very ...
customer_reviews.text: I have several different brands of security type cameras( dropcam, simplisafe, and logitech ). This was the easiest to set up. The app is the best, and the connection to my wi-fi is very stable, I like this product the best.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: ... work with our Verizon mifi internet- unless you have good internet do not
customer_reviews.text: Just so everyone knows this would not work with our Verizon mifi internet- unless you have good internet do not buy
customer_reviews.author: BigRed454v8

product_meta.title: Guardzilla Indoor HD WiFi Security Camera with 100Db Siren and 2 Way Audio
feature_bullets: Hd quality: get Live streaming high definition quality video of your home through your smartphone from wherever you are, day or night.
Motion alerts: arm The system from the free App and get text, email or push alerts on your phone when motion is detected and a video record of the event.

All-in-one security: two-way audio lets you listen in and broadcast your voice into the monitored room through your smartphone. Optionally set an ear-piercing 100 decibel siren to deter would be intruders.
Easy setup: ready in 5 minutes: plug Guardzilla in, download the free App, connect to your home Wi-Fi and you're set.
Warranty & Customer Support: 1 year Warranty along with trustworthy us based phone Support to make sure your setup and operation go smoothly.
